description:
Fortress Mountain Ski area is closed as is the road for vehicle travel. However you can ride up the road in an hour and enjoy a rapid decent.
It's an 8 km one way trip up gaining about 500 meters.
It's a gravel road. The bridge at the start is closed and there is snowplow blocking the road.
This trail is right beside:
directions: Fortress access right across from the Fortress Junction gas station on Highway 40.  41.4km South of Hiway #1.
title: Fortress Ski access Road
